00046 
00047 #ifndef __IAM_ULIB_H__
00048 #define __IAM_ULIB_H__
00049 
00056 #define DX_FMT_NAME_LEN 16
00057 
00058 enum iam_fmt_t {
00059         FMT_LFIX,
00060         FMT_LVAR
00061 };
00062 
00063 struct iam_uapi_info {
00064         __u16 iui_keysize;
00065         __u16 iui_recsize;
00066         __u16 iui_ptrsize;
00067         __u16 iui_height;
00068         char  iui_fmt_name[DX_FMT_NAME_LEN];
00069 };
00070 
00071 /*
00072  * Creat an iam file, but do NOT open it.
00073  * Return 0 if success, else -1.
00074  */
00075 int iam_creat(char *filename, enum iam_fmt_t fmt,
00076               int blocksize, int keysize, int recsize, int ptrsize);
00077 
00078 /*
00079  * Open an iam file, but do NOT creat it if the file doesn't exist.
00080  * Please use iam_creat for creating the file before use iam_open.
00081  * Return file id (fd) if success, else -1.
00082  */
00083 int iam_open(char *filename, struct iam_uapi_info *ua);
00084 
00085 /*
00086  * Close file opened by iam_open. 
00087  */
00088 int iam_close(int fd);
00089 
00090 /*
00091  * Please use iam_open before use this function.
00092  */
00093 int iam_insert(int fd, struct iam_uapi_info *ua,
00094                int key_need_convert, char *keybuf,
00095                int rec_need_convert, char *recbuf);
00096 
00097 /*
00098  * Please use iam_open before use this function.
00099  */
00100 int iam_lookup(int fd, struct iam_uapi_info *ua,
00101                int key_need_convert, char *key_buf,
00102                int *keysize, char *save_key,
00103                int rec_need_convert, char *rec_buf,
00104                int *recsize, char *save_rec);
00105 
00106 /*
00107  * Please use iam_open before use this function.
00108  */
00109 int iam_delete(int fd, struct iam_uapi_info *ua,
00110                int key_need_convert, char *keybuf,
00111                int rec_need_convert, char *recbuf);
00112 
00113 /*
00114  * Please use iam_open before use this function.
00115  */
00116 int iam_it_start(int fd, struct iam_uapi_info *ua,
00117                  int key_need_convert, char *key_buf,
00118                  int *keysize, char *save_key,
00119                  int rec_need_convert, char *rec_buf,
00120                  int *recsize, char *save_rec);
00121 
00122 /*
00123  * Please use iam_open before use this function.
00124  */
00125 int iam_it_next(int fd, struct iam_uapi_info *ua,
00126                 int key_need_convert, char *key_buf,
00127                 int *keysize, char *save_key,
00128                 int rec_need_convert, char *rec_buf,
00129                 int *recsize, char *save_rec);
00130 
00131 /*
00132  * Please use iam_open before use this function.
00133  */
00134 int iam_it_stop(int fd, struct iam_uapi_info *ua,
00135                 int key_need_convert, char *keybuf,
00136                 int rec_need_convert, char *recbuf);
00137 
00138 /*
00139  * Change iam file mode.
00140  */
00141 int iam_polymorph(char *filename, unsigned long mode);
00142 
00145 #endif
